fields.description: The MongoDB Atlas connection string. Type: string, SecureString or AzureKeyVaultSecretReference. Type: string, SecureString or AzureKeyVaultSecretReference.
fields.name: ConnectionString

fields.description: The name of the MongoDB Atlas database that you want to access. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: Database

fields.description: The driver version that you want to choose. Allowed value are v1 and v2. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: DriverVersion
